ygData.subject: Brian, did we get left out?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m wandering around in Mistmoore, and don t see our quest person anywhere, and I ve heard that it was broken as of 5:00 last night on Test? Do we have our
ygData.messageBody:
I'm wandering around in Mistmoore, and don't see our quest person
anywhere, and I've heard that it was broken as of 5:00 last night
on Test?

Do we have our quests for armor yet? Or are we once again forgotten?

I think the design of the SK class is great for RP'ers. They make
it difficult to play (which I like), KOS so you die often, and then
make sure all your quests are broken or nonexistant (where is our
SoulFire?) By level 30 you will become a master of Role Playing
an imbittered person full of hatred ;)

Anyone else out there found it yet?
Xilith
